front.title: SRH Reduction for SRv6 End.M.GTP6.E Behavior

abstract.t: Segment Routing over IPv6 for the Mobile User Plane specifies interworking between SRv6 networks and GTP-U networks including required behaviors. This document specifies a new behavior named End.M.GTP6.E.Red which improves the End.M.GTP6.E behavior more hardware-friendly by indicating the behavior with one SID.
